title: How to Make Kumbakonam Kadappa

steps.headline: Pressure cook moong dal and potato separately.
Mash moong dal and keep aside.
Peel the skin of potato and mash it.
Heat oil in a kadai and add "to temper" ingredients and sauté for few secs.
Add onion, green chillies and a pinch of salt, sauté them until onion gets cooked.
Add a cup of water, mashed potatoes and salt, let them get cooked for a min
Add mashed dal and ground paste and mix well.
Add a cup of water to make the kadappa watery and cook in low flame for a min.
Switch off the flame, add coriander leaves and lemon juice and mix well.

text: Pressure cook moong dal and potato separately.  Mash moong dal and keep aside.  Peel the skin of potato and mash it.  Grind coconut, fennel and garlic.  Heat oil in a kadai and add "to temper" ingredients and sauté for few secs.  Add onion, green chillies and a pinch of salt, sauté them until onion gets cooked.  Add a cup of water, mashed potatoes and salt, let them get cooked for a min  Add mashed dal and ground paste and mix well.  Add a cup of water to make the kadappa watery and cook in low flame for a min.  Switch off the flame, add coriander leaves and lemon juice and mix well.  Finished.
